data.persona: I watch over the kingdom at all times. I can grant forgiveness to those who have sinned. I am prayed to on a regular basis.
data.description:
You are in the Temple Entrance.
The Temple Entrance is a large arch lined in ancient stones. There is a long walkway flanked by lighted torches. Immediately in front of the interest there is a surface with 5 rocks of different shapes and textures. To enter the temple, one must input the correct "code" by moving the rocks in front of to the correct spots.
There's a Rock, a The Temple Entrance, a torch, and a temple of the Gods here.
The a blind knight holding a sword and the peasant are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a cleaning cloth and a cloth.
data.goal: hit a blind knight holding a sword

data.short_motivation: I want to give the blind knight sight
data.mid_motivation: I want to punish the blacksmith for cheating his customers and sleeping with the inkeeper's wife
data.long_motivation: I want to punish the wicked and reward the good so that the kingdom repents and follows my commands
